articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Houston uneasy beneath black plume of days-long chemical fire
articles.description: Rachel Maddow reports on a massive fire at a chemical storage facility near Houston, Texas that has been burning since Sunday with black smoke drifting for many miles over Houston and its surrounding suburbs.

articles.title: Why Devin Nunes' lawsuit against Twitter...
articles.description: In reality, a lawsuit like this should do lasting harm to Nunes' reputation. In contemporary GOP politics, however, it will probably elevate his standing.
articles.content: For at least a generation or two, one of the Republican Party’s core policy goals was putting an end to frivolous lawsuits. GOP officials and candidates, for as long as I can remember, have used the phrase trial lawyers as a nasty epithet – always repeated wi… [+3401 chars]
